faq.answer1: Colmena is a 100% free of charge and secure productivity suite for local and community media.
faq.question2: 2 - What are the technologies behind Colmena?
faq.answer2: An integrated free software progressive web app (PWA) solution for mobile environments that works both online and offline
faq.answer3: A safe, private and free tool for local and community media and human rights activists promoting gender equality, diversity and grassroot communication.
faq.answer4: To join the Colmena instance, maintained by REDES and DW Akademie, you must request an access code and it is necessary to accept the code of conduct / terms of use based on digital human rights and diversity.
faq.question5: 5 - Can I have my own instance of Colmena?
faq.answer5: Yes, it is free software! You can install Colmena on your own server. Check out the documentation
faq.question6: 6 - What are the main features of Colmena?
faq.answer6: It is a productivity suite for community radios with audio recording and editing tools; offline mode which allows some tools to be used without Internet; collaborative space with chat and file sharing; secure content synchronization to the Colmena cloud
faq.answer7: Audio recorder, editor and streamer. Also an audio conferencing (with people from your media or external guests) tool is provided.
faq.question8: 8 - What are the audio formats and their metadata ?
faq.answer8: The standardized audio format for the Web is Opus, being fully supported. Other formats like MP3 and AAC will also be provided as well as uncompressed audio for editing. The metadata system will follow the Dublin Core international protocols to guarantee the interoperability of the files.
faq.question9: 9 - How does the collaborative space works?
faq.answer9: It is your daily chat room with the possibility of sharing files and folders with your team.
faq.question10: 10 - How are my files stored? Is there a storage limit?
faq.answer10: Privacy by design with backup of local files into the cloud with up to 50GB using Nextcloud and WebDav.
faq.question11: 11 – Does Colmena have a section to publish audios or news?
faq.answer11: Yes, there is an area for publications: audio, text and images. Once published, anyone can share on social networks or take the code to embed the audio or file on their own website.
faq.question12: 12 – What kind of licence will be available?
faq.answer12: By default, the publications are published with a Creative Commons BY-SA-NC license. But you will be able to choose another license in each publication: both the other CC licenses or P2P License.
